author: jsdelfino
msg: Factor common functions in a single class. Multiple bug fixes in the admin components, fixed creation of cloud directory, only consider node composites included in cloud.composite, delete node composite files in delete method. Fixed name of file server directory. Minor UI fixes.

author: dain
msg: Added UrlCache which copies URLs to a temp directory before adding them to a class loader
Removed usage of XBean class loader as UrlCache makes it unnecessary

Temp class loader can no longer be created directly with URLs.  Instead an application class loader should be created and wrapped with a temp class loader.  The createTempClassLoader in ClassLoaderUtil does exactly this.
Added extensive debug logging to ClassLoaderUtil and UrlCache
